content: the front down to match the back and then join in the round to work the body once the body is finished stitches will be picked up for the neckline and armholes to work the ribbed edges in the round stocking stitch the body of this vest is worked in stocking stitch which is worked as follows when mentioned in the pattern stocking stitch knit flat stocking stitch knit in the round r1 rs knit to end r1 rs knit to end r2 ws purl to end pattern back r3 rs k1 m1l k to last stitch m1r k1 2 stitches increased using 7mm needles cast on 40 42 42 44 46 r4 ws p1 m1rp p to last stitch m1lp p1 2 46 48 48 50 sts using the long-tail cast on or your preferred method stitches increased work flat in stocking stitch until work measures work r3 and r4 - - - - 0 2 5 6 7 more 24 22 5 21 5 20 5 20 5 21 5 22 5 22 5 22 5 times cm from cast on edge 42 48 54 60 66 72 80 84 90 back stitches after shaping we will now increase 1 stitch at each edge to cut yarn and place all back stitches on hold by shape the armholes as follows transferring them to a long piece of scrap yarn or a spare circular needle r1 rs k1 m1l k to last stitch m1r k1 2 stitches increased r2 ws purl to end work r1 and r2 0 2 5 7 7 6 3 3 3 more times sizes xl 2xl 3xl 4xl and 5xl only 3 see my vest - chunky v2 | designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2023 left front as worn right front as worn using 7mm needles with right side of fabric using your 7mm needles and with right side of facing you and starting 8 9 8 9 10 9 10 9 fabric facing you pick up and knit 8 9 8 9 10 10 sts away from the left-most edge pick up 9 10 9 10 sts along the cast on edge of the and knit 8 9 8 9 10 9 10 9 10 sts along the back starting from the right-most stitch cast on edge of the back work flat in stocking stitch until work measures work flat in stocking stitch until work measures 5 5 5 5 5 5 6 5 6 5 5 5 6 5 6 5 6 5 cm from 5 5 5 5 5 5 6 5 6 5 5 5 6 5 6 5 6 5 cm from shoulder edge shoulder edge we will now shape the right front neck we will now shape the left front neck r1 rs knit to last st m1r k1 1 stitch r1 rs k1 m1l k to end 1 stitch increased increased r2 ws purl to end r2 ws purl to end work r1 and r2
